column6:
RAMA-TUT, the Pharaoh from the Future, has reached through time to kidnap the Thing's girlfriend (who happens to be quite the sculptress) to design his pyramid for him, and only the Four can rescue her!,2007,4
32 PGS./All Ages ...$2.99
